name: 陳維昌
objective:
The course introduces the properties of signals and systems, and is a fundamental course for those who are interested in communications, signal processing, control systems, and electronic circuits. The student will learn about the basic concepts of continuous-time and discrete-time signal processing. The covered topics are:

1. Signals and systems
2. Linear time-invariant systems
3. Fourier series representation of periodic signals
4. The continuous-time Fourier transform
5. The discrete-time Fourier transform
6. Time and frequency characterization of signals and systems (optional)
7. Sampling
8. The Z-transform (optional)
9. The Laplace-transform (optional)
